citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
One bottle of Metronidazole with an expiration date of 31Aug2023 and a bottle of Ponazuril with an expiration date of
10/21/24 were identified during the inspection. Expired medication could lose potency and its use does not meet the
standard of care. Expired medications must be removed from the kennel as not to cause harm to the animals. The
licensee disposed of the expired medications at the time of the inspection.
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “B” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the
applicant.
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by July 28, 2025-60 days counted from 1st RL Inspection or
the applicant will forfeit the license fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your
next Re-License Inspection.
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
One bottle of Metronidazole with an expiration date of 31Aug2023 and a bottle of Ponazuril with an expiration date of 
10/21/24 were identified during the inspection. Expired medication could lose potency and its use does not meet the 
standard of care. Expired medications must be removed from the kennel as not to cause harm to the animals. The 
licensee disposed of the expired medications at the time of the inspection. 
 
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “B” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. 
 
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by July 28, 2025-60 days counted from 1st RL Inspection or 
the applicant will forfeit the license fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your 
next Re-License Inspection. 
 
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires. 
 
 n
